name: Template Knowledge Source
description: Template descriptor for creating new knowledge sources

static.text: TEMPLATE KNOWLEDGE: Use this descriptor as a starting point to author new knowledge sources. Replace this text with domain-specific content.
suggestions: Start here to author a new knowledge source
What are the required fields for a descriptor?

metadata.longDescription:
Title: Template Knowledge Source

Summary: A template descriptor to use when creating new knowledge sources.

What I can read: Descriptor-provided static content.

What I can do: Serve as an example for required fields and suggestions.

How to ask: "How do I create a new knowledge source?"

Limitations: Replace with domain-specific content before seeding in production.
